Blog.post: Hey, how is everyone this is strange I'm still not use to this blog thing but its great see I found this great poem well I think it is tell me what you think "you hurt me, you think I care?, you destroyed me, you think I care, you made me cry, and again you think I care? well if you thought that, then you thought right, I do care that you hurt me, and destroyed me and made me cry, but in the end it makes me stronger, colder, ice"

well this is my first blog and well don't have a lot to say I've been reading my friends ones and they are all interesting so now I can post stuff on them but lol I'll try and make this interesting for you readers....

Hey, how are you all? I'm bored I'm at school at the moment not that exciting lol I really have no idea what to say I'm not in deep mood but I suppose you guys never see me in it hmmm catch ya peanuts

Hey Hey! I just got back from Auckland! I went to a confrence there it was so awesome 950 people went I love the chant "new zealand, new zealand is on fire, we all hate the devil coz the devil is a liar!" just imagine 950 people yelling that at the top of there voices awesome! it was great and now I have church on Saturday night and Marcel wants to take me! and he is some hot stuff! lol I didn't just say that ha ha yes anyway thats all I have to say bye "don't mess with a black mans boom box!"

well tonight I went to church (yay) I know some of my friends look at me funny when I say yay I'm going to church coz before I was all out in to other stuff but maybe its just they don't know what I feel when I go there I feel like I'm returning home which is unusally for me since I got kicked out from my house 2 years ago now! but anyway after church we went to maccas and in my true style there is this one guy that hates me so I started throwing ice cubes at him ha ha but then he shoved them down my top and it got stuck there and I didn't want to get it out :( so I drove home yes after 10 (my licence runs out then) with this huge piece of ice melting it was so cold! I have to get my revenge hmmmm.........

Hey, well I don't think I ever blog any more lol well I'm rather bored I just bought a car so I'm usually not home any more I bet I won't get invited anywhere this weekend I might go crash at someones house! lol anyway I have to go do something I might go through drive through I see myself getting rather fat very soon. Jenny

Hey there. I don't have a lot to talk about I'm a little annoyed with some of my friends today because they made fun of what I believe in but yet if someone is mean to them for their choice I'm always there supporting them 100% and usually shouting abuse back and the rude people who are being mean it just doesn't seem fair why does life suck so much that this is what it comes down to what we wear doesn't make us who we are we make ourselfs who we are its not my fault people won't take the time to get to know me! and respect what I believe in...
